overview: Inma Cuesta and Quim Gutiérrez are the fashionable actor couple. But in their day-to-day life they realise that they no longer kiss like they do in the movies. Their relationship goes into crisis and they start a fun plan to reconquer their relationship: champagne, lobster, music, fireworks... whatever it takes to reconnect in the perfect scene! Everything seems to be going well, but accidentally the magic moment doesn't end as expected.
title: Un beso de película
